job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pAs part of a high performing global team the right candidate will play a handson role in the design and development for implementing Machine learning best practices in network traffic data collection processing analysis and monitoringppnbspppResponsibilitiesnbsppulliDesign develop and maintain key frameworks services and applications for network traffic data collection processing analysis correlation and monitoring in Cloud ProductsnbspliliExperience with applying statistical distribution analysis to dataliliHands on experience in designing batchbased realtime streaming and eventbased data solutions Spark Storm Flink etcnbspKafka expertise highly desiredliliProficient with microservicesbased APIEndpoint architecturesliliExperience in network traffic data collection processing analysis and monitoring and solid understanding of protocols TCPIP IPv4IPv6 NetFlow sFlow IPFix NetconfYangliliUnderstanding of concepts of Radius PPPoE IP DHCP IP SNMPliliHighly proficient in Java Go Nodejs Scala or similar programming languagesliliExperience in building and productizing cloudbasedscale data ingestion preferably in AWSliliExperience in cloud data solutions like Elastic Greenplum Redshift or like technologies a plusnbsplili5 10 years of highly technical handson software engineering experience Independent and Self driven and works in a TeamliliCustomer facing engineering role in debugging and resolving field issuesliliParticipate and drive technical discussions within engineering group in all phases of the SDLC review requirements produce design documents participate in Peer reviews produce test plans support QA team provide internal training and support TAC teamnbspliliOrganized and goalfocused ability to deliver in a fastpaced environmentliliStrong creative problemsolving skills and ability to abstract and share details to create meaningful articulationliliImplementation background in various data processing consumption patterns and pipelinesliulpp
